briefTitle: A Prospective Cohort With Patient Navigation as an Intervention for Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: The Journey of Women With Breast Cancer in Mozambique: What is the Best Path? A Prospective Cohort With Patient Navigation as an Intervention to Reduce Treatment Disparities
primaryOutcomeMeasure: time interval between admission and treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female
* 18 years and older
* will undergo breast cancer treatment at HCM
* consent to participate

Exclusion Criteria:

* male
* less than18 years of age
* history of other previous malignancies (including breast cancer)
* history of breast cancer treatment initiated elsewhere
* lack of consent to participate
